title: G-7 Wrap, Biden’s 2020 Lead Shrinking
itunes:title: G-7 Wrap, Biden’s 2020 Lead Shrinking
description:
Guests: Emily Miller, Republican strategist and former Deputy Press Secretary at the State Department and Josh Galper, co-founder and partner of public relations firm Trident DMG and the law firm Davis, Goldberg & Galper. Hagar Chemali, CEO of Greenwich Media Strategies and former Treasury spokesperson for Terrorism and Financial Intelligence discussed the G-7 summit.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
